mapper.sql: id, model_name, model_type, provider, version, base_url, api_key_required, max_tokens, rate_limit, `status`, metadata, is_deleted, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert:
insert into code_push.sys_ai_model_info (model_name, model_type, provider, version, base_url, api_key_required, max_tokens, rate_limit, `status`, metadata, is_deleted, create_time, update_time) values
(#{item.modelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.modelType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.provider,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.baseUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.apiKeyRequired,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{item.maxTokens,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.rateLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.metadata,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{item.isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
